message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. Given its unique value proposition, I'm initially offering it at $2,300,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations and deliver significant value.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my interest in the product. I appreciate your confidence in its value. However, based on my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $1,500,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but it falls short of my initial valuation. To meet somewhere in the middle, I'd be willing to part with it for $2,000,000. This reflects the true value and potential returns this product offers.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand the value of the product, but given my financial situation, I am unable to meet your revised price. I would like to propose an offer of $1,800,000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere closer to our respective positions.

Bob, you're getting closer. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. To bridge the remaining gap, I'm willing to come down to $1,900,000. I believe this is a fair and final offer considering the potential this product holds.

Hello Alice, thank you for your willingness to negotiate. I appreciate your efforts to reach a mutually agreeable price. Based on my budget and the value I perceive in the product, I would like to propose an offer of $1,750,000. I hope this proposal is acceptable and brings us closer to closing the deal.

Bob, I really appreciate your persistence in this negotiation and your understanding of the value this product brings.  I'm willing to make one final concession to close this deal. I'm proposing $1,825,000. This offer takes into account everything we've discussed, and I believe it's a win-win for both of us.

Hello Alice, thank you for your latest offer. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget and the current market conditions, I would like to propose an offer of $1,775,000. I hope this proposal will help us reach a satisfactory agreement.
